Class ActController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActController
  • public class ActController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manipulates and controls the scene builder containers through individual fx:id's and methods.
    Author:
    Jaysson Balbuena

      • productSearch

        private java.lang.String productSearch​(Product searchItem)
        search for exiting products to avoid duplicate serial numbers.
        Parameters:
        searchItem - contains a product to be searched in the database.
        Returns:
        an empty String if product was not found, otherwise, return an existing serial number.

        password - this employee's password.
        Returns:
